name: Animated Liquid Toggle Tutorial
description:
Learn how to create an Animated Liquid Toggle.


Join me in my latest tutorial series as we create an animated liquid toggle or just checkout the FREE examples to use in your Figma designs.


  1. Episode 1 - Introduction
  2. Episode 2 - Learn how to make an interactive component toggle in Figma
  3. Episode 3 - How to export your toggle from Figma to After Effects
  4. Episode 4 - How to animated a liquid toggle in After Effects
  5. Episode 5 - Export the liquid toggle as a lottie file that you can use in all your Digital Product designs.
  6. Episode 6 - Coming soon... How to use LottieFiles in your code


This free tutorial series covers everything you need to know when it comes to creating animated components, micro interactions and more in Figma, AfterEffects and LottieFiles.


Level up your design skills by adding motion design and micro interactions into your design toolset so that you can add moments of delight to your work.
